channel.description: Extend a user registration flow Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Registration inline hook: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/registration-inline-hook/nodejs/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
